mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALARY (EMPNO, ACCOUNTINGPERIOD, SALARYCATEGORY, SALARYNAME, SALARYDAY, SALARY, SALARYINFO) VALUES ( #{empNo}, #{accountingPeriod}, #{salaryCategory}, #{salaryName}, #{salaryDay}, #{salary}, #{salaryInfo} )

INSERT INTO SALARY_MODIFY_LOG ( salary_No, empNo, ename, accountingPeriod, salaryCategory, salaryName, salaryDay, salary, salaryInfo, modifyReason, whoModify, logDate, logStatus ) VALUES ( #{salary_No}, #{empNo}, #{ename}, #{accountingPeriod}, #{salaryCategory}, #{salaryName}, #{salaryDay}, #{salary}, #{salaryInfo}, #{modifyReason}, #{whoModify}, DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{logStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT S.SALARY_NO, S.EMPNO, H.ENAME as ename, S.ACCOUNTINGPERIOD, S.SALARYCATEGORY, S.SALARYNAME, S.SALARYDAY, S.SALARY, S.SALARYINFO FROM SALARY S JOIN HRM H ON S.EMPNO = H.EMPNO WHERE S.SALARY_NO = #{salary_No}
SELECT S.SALARY_NO, S.EMPNO, H.ENAME as ename, S.ACCOUNTINGPERIOD, S.SALARYCATEGORY, S.SALARYNAME, S.SALARYDAY, S.SALARY, S.SALARYINFO FROM SALARY S JOIN HRM H ON S.EMPNO = H.EMPNO
mapper.update: UPDATE salary SET accountingperiod = #{accountingPeriod}, salarycategory = #{salaryCategory}, salaryname = #{salaryName}, salaryday = #{salaryDay}, salary = #{salary}, salaryinfo = #{salaryInfo} WHERE salary_no = #{salary_No}
